experiment_info.name: laplace_domain_initialization
experiment_info.description: Transform sensor time series to Laplace domain for initialization
experiment_info.hypothesis: Laplace domain has simpler analytical form for heat diffusion, may improve initialization

reason_aborted: INITIALIZATION FAMILY EXHAUSTED (v1-v5). 5+ prior experiments conclusively show triangulation + hotspot init is optimal. Key quote: 'Simple is better - the hottest-sensor approach works well'. Laplace domain is mathematically elegant but still targets initialization, which is already solved.

physics_informed_init.conclusion: The initialization family should be marked as EXHAUSTED

improved_triangulation_init.conclusion: Acoustic formulas use WRONG physics for heat diffusion

key_insight: Laplace domain analysis cannot help initialization because: (1) sensor readings are already at final steady-state or near-steady-state, (2) the time-series information needed for Laplace analysis would require sub-timestep resolution we don't have, (3) all 5+ initialization improvements have failed because the simple hottest-sensor heuristic is already optimal for this problem.
